{
  "name": "action-result",
  "schema": {
    "$schema": "https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema",
    "properties": {
      "action": {
        "type": "string"
      },
      "backend": {
        "type": "string"
      },
      "dryRun": {
        "type": "boolean"
      },
      "nowPlaying": {
        "type": "object"
      },
      "ok": {
        "type": "boolean"
      },
      "playlist": {
        "type": "string"
      },
      "playlistId": {
        "type": "string"
      },
      "rooms": {
        "items": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "type": "array"
      },
      "shortcut": {
        "type": "string"
      }
    },
    "required": [
      "ok",
      "action"
    ],
    "type": "object"
  }
}
